testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.19 [Need to Share Section Timing Patterns] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Section Timing Pattern Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.11.15.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N104R1109_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N104R1109_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Red Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pedestrian Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Steady-dont-walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Sequence Information - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Timing Pattern Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 18 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N104R1109_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 19 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 19.1 VERIFY that a sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 19.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.3 VERIFY that a section-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.4 VERIFY that a section-timing-pattern-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.5 VERIFY that a section-cycle-length data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item

Step 19.6 VERIFY that an intersection-id data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 19.7 VERIFY that a cycle-length data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 19.8 VERIFY that an offset-time data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 19.9 VERIFY that a phase-identifier data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 19.10 VERIFY that a coordinated-phase data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 19.11 VERIFY that a split-mode data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 19.12 VERIFY that a phase-split data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.13 IF TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 19.13.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.14 IF TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 19.14.1 VERIFY that a section-timing-pattern-name data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.15 IF TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.15.1 VERIFY that a maximum-green-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.16 IF TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.16.1 VERIFY that a minimum-green-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.17 IF TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.17.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-clearance-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.18 IF TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.18.1 VERIFY that a vehicle-red-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.19 IF TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.19.1 VERIFY that a minimum-walk-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.20 IF TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.20.1 VERIFY that a pedestrian-clearance-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.21 IF TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.21.1 VERIFY that a steady-dont-walk-duration data element exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 19.22 IF TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 19.22.1 VERIFY that a sequence-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing
Step 19.23 IF TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 19.23.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 19.24 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 20 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 20.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 20.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 20.7 IF TMDD_N104R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 20.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 21 EXIT
